name: Trackstar
headline: Plaid for supply chain logistics
description: Trackstar is the Plaid for supply chain logistics. Our universal API provides a simple and well-documented way for companies to integrate with hundreds of warehouse management systems in minutes, not months.

founders.name: Jeremy Schneck, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Trackstar. Former Vice President on the retail, consumer products, and food & beverage investing team at Oak Hill Advisors. Board Member and former President of Reading Reflections, a 501(c)(3) registered non-profit that donates books to underserved local and international youth. Studied finance and management at Wharton.

founders.name: Daniel Langer, Founder
founders.description: Chicago born & raised. Former Director of Product @ Datadog. Lover of surfing, tennis, and sci-fi books.

# for 3PLs & Warehouse
# Management Systems
# for Warehouse Management Systems
Add powerful 3PL & WMS integrations to your application with a single API.
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
step
1
Connect Once
We do the hard integration work of normalizing data across dozens of 3PLs and WMS into a unified schema.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65afe754954f7a0ceeff96c1_mas.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65afe73e1add8828519b105d_fle.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65b928ac19998e6dc391897c_shipsteam.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65b92896099e98bb48aaaf7c_shipbob.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65bab25c49680c667df476cf_veracore.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65bab232284014a02f23ff85_Shipwire_CEVA_Logo_Blk_2x%201.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65bab1e2b47d224f0e5a56ae_skuvault-new-logo%201.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65bab1c8ef91693a0988540b_ShipMonk%20Logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/665ed2ba109d3c949bfa8c2e_000.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/665ed2bae12f9a823731f216_001.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/665ed2ba07a4ae2d1ba49d48_002.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/665ed2ba7433c04987433158_003.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/665ed2ba9c6e3b39fffe85e2_100.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/665ed2ba07a4ae2d1ba49d45_101.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/665ed2ba3bc21740d702fb2f_102.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/665ed2ba86efb1a0ef4e3fe9_103.webp)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65bbc9e2f0aeb57acd070342_trackstar-hq.svg)
Trackstar
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65bbc9ec974860be6ebd4a0f_yourco.svg)
yourco
step
2
Your Data, Your Way
Build new products and features into your platform using this new data source.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65b2cdde636843f02cb7fe91_grid.png)
step
3
Onboard Customers
Trackstar’s frontend modal allows your users to connect their 3PL or WMS in seconds. No design or CSS experience required.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65b2cdde636843f02cb7fe91_grid.png)
Unified
Schemas
Data We Offer
Inventory
Accurate, detailed, and real-time inventory levels across warehouses.
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65a03944f1e85d789d367463_icon-arrow-right.svg)](https://www.trackstarhq.com/<https:/docs.trackstarhq.com/wms-api/inventory/info>)
Products
Product catalog data from D2C, wholesale, and all other channels.
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65a03944f1e85d789d367463_icon-arrow-right.svg)](https://www.trackstarhq.com/<https:/docs.trackstarhq.com/wms-api/products/info>)
Orders
Track customer orders through the entire fulfillment process.
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65a03944f1e85d789d367463_icon-arrow-right.svg)](https://www.trackstarhq.com/<https:/docs.trackstarhq.com/wms-api/orders/info>)
ASNs
Know when goods are en route to the warehouse, and when they've arrived.
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65a03944f1e85d789d367463_icon-arrow-right.svg)](https://www.trackstarhq.com/<https:/docs.trackstarhq.com/wms-api/inbound-shipments/info>)
Returns (RMAs)
Customer returns are hard, but better RMA data makes it easier.
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65a03944f1e85d789d367463_icon-arrow-right.svg)](https://www.trackstarhq.com/<https:/docs.trackstarhq.com/wms-api/returns/info>)
Billing & Invoices
Understand 3PL costs: picking, packing, shipping, storage, and more.
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65a03944f1e85d789d367463_icon-arrow-right.svg)](https://www.trackstarhq.com/<https:/docs.trackstarhq.com/introduction>)
Labor Activities
Want to know who picked and packed an order, and when? Now you can.
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65a03944f1e85d789d367463_icon-arrow-right.svg)](https://www.trackstarhq.com/<https:/docs.trackstarhq.com/introduction>)
And More
Check out our API Docs to see a detailed list of the endpoints we offer. 
[Learn More![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65a03944f1e85d789d367463_icon-arrow-right.svg)](https://www.trackstarhq.com/<https:/docs.trackstarhq.com/introduction>)
Developer
Experience
Built For Developers, By Developers
Trackstar's full toolbox offers you a delightful developer experience: a fast and feature rich API, beautiful documentation, a developer portal, sandbox environments, webhooks, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65b8206f48918891d7e1ec0f_dash.png)
Tangible
ROI
Why Trackstar
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65bab3d40c9e5f87a706cfd1_group_add.svg)
Onboard More Customers
Support for dozens of new integrations means you can expand your sellable market and close customers more quickly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65bab409c3ad06047c8b87c3_acute.svg)
Get Back Dev Time
Leave the heavy lifting to us so you never have to think about building a 3PL or WMS integration again.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65bab4151dacfc909456fbc0_rocket_launch.svg)
Launch New Features
Integrate to Trackstar in hours and immediately start using 3PL/WMS data to build the new features you need.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65c00db4da2416d927066fc7_Turbine%20Logo.png)](https://www.trackstarhq.com/<https:/www.helloturbine.com/>)
Trackstar has accelerated our feature launch timeline and significantly reduced our engineering costs. I love that their API lets us focus on our core product instead of spending time dealing with the complexities of WMS and 3PL integrations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65c00dad1769a67a57c4a643_Emilie%20Photo.jpeg)
Emilie Schario
CEO, Founder
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65c554333e46a17570525ede_Luminous.svg)](https://www.trackstarhq.com/<https:/www.joinluminous.com/>)
Trackstar has transformed our go-to-market strategy by removing the bottleneck of WMS integrations. We target and onboard customers in a fraction of the time - both our sales and engineering teams love working with them!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65c55479b258e8b4b85bdd1b_brendon.jpeg)
Brendon Beebe
CTO
backed
by
![Y Combinator logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65a189dd248b691e4779f598_Y-Combinator.svg)![TMV logo.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65a189e43526f65171e6b329_tmv.svg)
Get Started
In hours, you can add 3PL & WMS integrations to your application. Fill out the Get Started form to receive an API Key, no credit card required.
[Get Started![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65a03944f1e85d789d367463_icon-arrow-right.svg)](https://www.trackstarhq.com/</get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65bbe6cf687f64acaff2bcb5_cam.png)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a010bdda1010f2f63dea6b/65a02527e83bbe450b24de45_trackstar.svg)](https://www.trackstarhq.com/</>)

generated_description:
Trackstar is a promising startup that's essentially the "Plaid for supply chain logistics." Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Winter '23 batch, Trackstar seeks to simplify and accelerate integrations for companies looking to manage their warehouse logistics efficiently. Headquartered in New York with a lean team of six, Trackstar enables businesses to connect with numerous warehouse management systems via their universal API—making integration a matter of minutes instead of months.

The company’s mission is straightforward: make the complexities of supply chain logistics manageable and user-friendly. They provide a robust platform that allows developers to normalize data across various third-party logistics (3PL) and warehouse systems into a unified schema. This helps businesses seamlessly onboard customers and enhance their offerings without the usual technical headaches.

Trackstar currently offers several solutions, including services tailored for commerce, supply chain logistics, fintech, and direct integrations with 3PLs. Their API covers key logistics data like inventory levels, order tracking, and billing insights, which can significantly streamline operations for companies dealing with logistics.

Key team member Aaron Epstein acts as the Group Partner, and the company is tagged in the SaaS, B2B, logistics, and supply chain sectors, reflecting its broad applicability to various industries. 

What’s really enticing about Trackstar is its focus on developer experience. The platform boasts beautiful documentation, a developer portal, and sandbox environments for testing, which are crucial for modern software development. This, combined with its strategic backing by Y Combinator, positions Trackstar as a significant player in the logistics tech space.

If you're involved in any aspect of logistics or supply chain management and find yourself needing to simplify complex integrations, Trackstar might just be the solution you’ve been looking for. To find out more, you can visit their website at [TrackstarHQ.com](https://www.trackstarhq.com/).
